name: ALIEN XENOBLASTER
description:
NOTE: The game is still in development, so the screenshots shown are subject to change!!!

A kick-ass arcade themed game starring Blunt, a pissed off alien on her way to eliminate an entire planet full of aliens because they look stupid. Is there really more of a reason needed? As she sets bait with cardboard cutouts of hot women, battle your way through 8 worlds with loads of content and incel goobers...

WHAT'S THE GAMEPLAY LIKE?
Arcade themed platforming, climbing, and shootin'!

CONTENT!
- 6 World Campaign (Starring Blunt)
- 5 Bossfights
- Hard Mode (Starring Kif)
- Boss Rush
- 2-4 Player Co-op Mode
- 7 Challenges
- 12 Character Cast
- Character Cameos
- the obligatory "and more"...
